title: (x) compressed sans used in Feltron 2006 Annual Report - Opti Giant {Jelmar Geertsma}
content:
I'm sure this has been on before but I can't find it in search.

More examples at [www.feltron.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013182004/http:/www.feltron.com/ "www.feltron.com") under '2006 Annual Report'

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013182004im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ar06_01_5959.jpg)
author: jameslangdon

comments.content: Strange... Nicolas says the font is not available to buy, but I have it?

Then it probably was on sale at some point, but isn't anymore. :)

Just a guess, I have no idea where it was sold. Do you remember where you purchased it?
